name: MoveModelAX2012
description: Does Move a Model within a Model store in an AX 2012 Environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: identificationType
inputs.label: Identification type
inputs.helpMarkDown: How should the identification be done?

inputs.name: modelName
inputs.label: Model name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the model. (Not allowed if a minifest file path is set)

inputs.name: manifestFileName
inputs.label: Manifest file path (.xml)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies an XML file that identifies a model. Use the Get-AXModelManifest cmdlet with the -Xml parameter to output a sample manifest file. (Not allowed if a model name is set)

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - Move a Model within a Model store in AX2012: $(targetModelName)
